questions.question: Is the Build and Baraka app free?
questions.answer: Yes, Build and Baraka is completely free to download and use. We believe that access to spiritual tools should be accessible to all Muslims.

questions.question: On which platforms is the app available?
questions.answer: Build and Baraka is available on iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). We are also working on a web version for maximum accessibility.

questions.question: How are prayer times calculated?
questions.answer: We use precise algorithms based on your geolocation and internationally recognized calculation methods. You can adjust settings according to your juridical school.

questions.question: What exactly is halal entrepreneurship?
questions.answer: Halal entrepreneurship consists of developing commercial activities while respecting Islamic principles: no riba (usury), no gharar (excessive speculation), and lawful products/services.

questions.question: Can I use the app without internet connection?
questions.answer: Yes, most features work offline: tasbih, duas, prophet stories. Only prayer times require a connection for synchronization.

questions.question: How can I download the ebook for free?
questions.answer: Simply click the download button, enter your email, and you will immediately receive the guide 'The 7 Pillars of Halal Entrepreneurship' in PDF.

questions.question: What is Build and Baraka?
questions.answer: Build and Baraka is a complete mobile application dedicated to Muslims, offering all the essential tools to enrich your daily religious practice: prayer times, prophet stories, duas, and much more.

questions.question: Is the application free?
questions.answer: Yes, Build and Baraka is completely free to download and use. We believe that access to spiritual tools should be accessible to all Muslims without financial barriers.

questions.question: On which platforms is the application available?
questions.answer: Build and Baraka is available on iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). We are also working on a web version for maximum accessibility.

questions.question: How do prayer times work?
questions.answer: Our prayer times use precise algorithms based on your geolocation and internationally recognized calculation methods. You can adjust settings according to your juridical school.

questions.question: Can I use the application without internet connection?
questions.answer: Yes, most features work offline: tasbih, duas, prophet stories, 99 names of Allah. Only prayer times and Mecca live stream require a connection.

questions.question: Does the application consume a lot of battery?
questions.answer: No, Build and Baraka is optimized to minimize battery consumption. Prayer notifications use efficient techniques to preserve your device's autonomy.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account to use the application?
questions.answer: An account is not mandatory to use basic features. However, creating an account allows you to sync your favorites and preferences across multiple devices.

questions.question: How can I bookmark duas?
questions.answer: In the Duas section, simply tap the star icon next to the supplication you want to save. Find all your favorites in the dedicated tab.
